Package com.example.hoard

Class ItemDBController

java.lang.Object
com.example.hoard.ItemDBController
public class ItemDBController extends Object
Controller for managing item database operations. This class serves as a mediator between the application logic and the Firestore database, handling the creation, retrieval, update, and deletion of items. It utilizes the ItemDB class for direct database interactions and provides a singleton instance for global access.
